name: IMDb: Highlight 2018 releases nominated for Oscars
description: Provides highlighter-style background colors on links for films nominated for the 91st Academy Awards, to be held on 24 Feb 2019. Makes it especially easy to spot nominated films when browsing local theater showtimes on IMDb.
additional_info: Links to the eight Best Picture nominees are highlighted in green on IMDb. Feature-length films nominated in any other category are highlighted in yellow. Nominated short films are highlighted in pink. Visit http://www.imdb.com/oscars/nominations/ to test that the highlighting is working properly. As an example of how it works in showtime listings, check out what's playing in Hollywood right now. v1.0 (23 Jan 2019): Initial release. v1.1 (23 Jan 2019): Fixed incorrect IMDb ID for "Skin" (2018).
